protocol.text: Seedlings were sprayed either with deionised water (mock) or 50 uM antimycin A (Sigma) and put back to normal growth conditions for 3 hr before tissues were collected.
Seedlings were grown on GamborgB5 medium supplemented with 3 % sucrose under 16 h light/ 8h dark regime at 22 C (after 48 hr stratification at dark, at 4 C)
Qiagen RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen) according to manufacturer's instruction. On column Qiagen DNase digestion according to manufacturer's instruction.
Biotinylated aRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 400 ng total RNA input (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

Following fragmentation, 10 ug of labelled aRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip ATH1 Arabidopsis Expression Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using a Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 (7G)

The data were analyzed with GC - Robust Multi-array Average (GC-RMA) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 500.
